<Link id="l00024" /><CodeLine lineNumber="24"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// UnwindOpcodeStreamer - The simple wrapper over SmallVector to emit bytes</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00074" /><CodeLine lineNumber="74"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (RegSave &amp; (1u &lt;&lt; 4)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00075" /><CodeLine lineNumber="75"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The one byte opcode will always save r4, thus we can&#39;t use the one byte</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00076" /><CodeLine lineNumber="76"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// opcode when r4 is not in .save directive.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00077" /><CodeLine lineNumber="77"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00078" /><CodeLine lineNumber="78"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Compute the consecutive registers from r4 to r11.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00079" /><CodeLine lineNumber="79"><span class="doxyHighlight">    uint32&#95;t Mask = RegSave &amp; 0xff0u;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00080" /><CodeLine lineNumber="80"><span class="doxyHighlight">    uint32&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/nvptx/nvvmintrrange-cpp/#a34bd74317e3f04bfc4318c2d1a470877">Range</a> = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a239abca11deebf2731206dd41cf43c0e">llvm::countr&#95;one</a>(Mask &gt;&gt; 5); </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Exclude r4.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00081" /><CodeLine lineNumber="81"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Mask off non-consecutive registers. Keep r4.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00082" /><CodeLine lineNumber="82"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Mask &amp;= ~(0xffffffe0u &lt;&lt; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/nvptx/nvvmintrrange-cpp/#a34bd74317e3f04bfc4318c2d1a470877">Range</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00083" /><CodeLine lineNumber="83"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00084" /><CodeLine lineNumber="84"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Emit this opcode when the mask covers every registers.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00085" /><CodeLine lineNumber="85"><span class="doxyHighlight">    uint32&#95;t UnmaskedReg = RegSave &amp; 0xfff0u &amp; (~Mask);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00086" /><CodeLine lineNumber="86"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (UnmaskedReg == 0u) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00087" /><CodeLine lineNumber="87"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Pop r&#91;4 : (4 + n)&#93;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="88"><span class="doxyHighlight">      EmitInt8(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/arm/ehabi/#a391979058f7394854c8e99446129c5aaa0a91a90150205dd8f3e3f3e5d764e34c">ARM::EHABI::UNWIND&#95;OPCODE&#95;POP&#95;REG&#95;RANGE&#95;R4</a> | <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/nvptx/nvvmintrrange-cpp/#a34bd74317e3f04bfc4318c2d1a470877">Range</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="89"><span class="doxyHighlight">      RegSave &amp;= 0x000fu;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="90"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (UnmaskedReg == (1u &lt;&lt; 14)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="91"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Pop r&#91;14&#93; + r&#91;4 : (4 + n)&#93;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="92"><span class="doxyHighlight">      EmitInt8(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/arm/ehabi/#a391979058f7394854c8e99446129c5aaae8ab15ac55a28dc3b1954b3159a9cd61">ARM::EHABI::UNWIND&#95;OPCODE&#95;POP&#95;REG&#95;RANGE&#95;R4&#95;R14</a> | <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/nvptx/nvvmintrrange-cpp/#a34bd74317e3f04bfc4318c2d1a470877">Range</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="93"><span class="doxyHighlight">      RegSave &amp;= 0x000fu;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="94"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="95"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="98"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ((RegSave &amp; 0xfff0u) != 0)</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ((RegSave &amp; 0x000fu) != 0)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="103"><span class="doxyHighlight">    EmitInt16(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/arm/ehabi/#a391979058f7394854c8e99446129c5aaa9a03bf3866742ac1b888bee3b12b36f6">ARM::EHABI::UNWIND&#95;OPCODE&#95;POP&#95;REG&#95;MASK</a> | (RegSave &amp; 0x000fu));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="104"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="105"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="106"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Emit unwind opcodes for .vsave directives</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="107" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/unwindopcodeassembler/#a3d1741b5416a0fd627aa23c0eb0d7c7b"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/unwindopcodeassembler/#a3d1741b5416a0fd627aa23c0eb0d7c7b">UnwindOpcodeAssembler::EmitVFPRegSave</a>(uint32&#95;t VFPRegSave) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We only have 4 bits to save the offset in the opcode so look at the lower</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// and upper 16 bits separately.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (uint32&#95;t Regs : &#123;VFPRegSave &amp; 0xffff0000u, VFPRegSave &amp; 0x0000ffffu&#125;) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">while</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Regs) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Now look for a run of set bits. Remember the MSB and LSB of the run.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> RangeMSB = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a37c1fdede126353d80c3753dfe06f3c7">llvm::bit&#95;width</a>(Regs);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="114"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> RangeLen = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a8d92de57590536d2f254fe5e903e3372">llvm::countl&#95;one</a>(Regs &lt;&lt; (32 - RangeMSB));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="115"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> RangeLSB = RangeMSB - RangeLen;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Opcode = RangeLSB &gt;= 16</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="118"><span class="doxyHighlight">                       ? <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/arm/ehabi/#a391979058f7394854c8e99446129c5aaa943f3a70dcab5069c2f70c1745031102">ARM::EHABI::UNWIND&#95;OPCODE&#95;POP&#95;VFP&#95;REG&#95;RANGE&#95;FSTMFDD&#95;D16</a></span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="119"><span class="doxyHighlight">                       : <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/arm/ehabi/#a391979058f7394854c8e99446129c5aaaf3a1f5132396873d78fb4e5810ad2f82">ARM::EHABI::UNWIND&#95;OPCODE&#95;POP&#95;VFP&#95;REG&#95;RANGE&#95;FSTMFDD</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="120"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="121"><span class="doxyHighlight">      EmitInt16(Opcode | ((RangeLSB % 16) &lt;&lt; 4) | (RangeLen - 1));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="122"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="123"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Zero out bits we&#39;re done with.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="124"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Regs &amp;= ~(-1u &lt;&lt; RangeLSB);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="125"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="126"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="127"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00128" /><CodeLine lineNumber="128"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="129"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Emit unwind opcodes to copy address from source register to $sp.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="130" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/unwindopcodeassembler/#a1564384a9331059dce31b7164158bc97"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/unwindopcodeassembler/#a1564384a9331059dce31b7164158bc97">UnwindOpcodeAssembler::EmitSetSP</a>(uint16&#95;t Reg) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="131"><span class="doxyHighlight">  EmitInt8(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/arm/ehabi/#a391979058f7394854c8e99446129c5aaafb874bc6779295f8e3e6b4cecfd406bf">ARM::EHABI::UNWIND&#95;OPCODE&#95;SET&#95;VSP</a> | Reg);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="132"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="133"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="134"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Emit unwind opcodes to add $sp with an offset.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00135" /><CodeLine lineNumber="135" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/unwindopcodeassembler/#a7efb1fa1b6df24d22533caf41162d46b"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/unwindopcodeassembler/#a7efb1fa1b6df24d22533caf41162d46b">UnwindOpcodeAssembler::EmitSPOffset</a>(int64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="136"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a> &gt; 0x200) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="137"><span class="doxyHighlight">    uint8&#95;t Buff&#91;16&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="138"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Buff&#91;0&#93; = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/arm/ehabi/#a391979058f7394854c8e99446129c5aaac7fec19e4c3252adc0fe1c56e7517633">ARM::EHABI::UNWIND&#95;OPCODE&#95;INC&#95;VSP&#95;ULEB128</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="139"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">size&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ULEBSize = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ad0f8c0e82cde3bb0849fc59e3510f05a">encodeULEB128</a>((<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a> - 0x204) &gt;&gt; 2, Buff + 1);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="140"><span class="doxyHighlight">    emitBytes(Buff, ULEBSize + 1);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="141"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a> &gt; 0) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="142"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a> &gt; 0x100) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00143" /><CodeLine lineNumber="143"><span class="doxyHighlight">      EmitInt8(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/arm/ehabi/#a391979058f7394854c8e99446129c5aaaa5fb6fa61b25402c5a11953776e94069">ARM::EHABI::UNWIND&#95;OPCODE&#95;INC&#95;VSP</a> | 0x3fu);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="144"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a> -= 0x100;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="145"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="146"><span class="doxyHighlight">    EmitInt8(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/arm/ehabi/#a391979058f7394854c8e99446129c5aaaa5fb6fa61b25402c5a11953776e94069">ARM::EHABI::UNWIND&#95;OPCODE&#95;INC&#95;VSP</a> |</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="147"><span class="doxyHighlight">             </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static&#95;cast&lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">uint8&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">&gt;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">((<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a> - 4) &gt;&gt; 2));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="148"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a> &lt; 0) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="149"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">while</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a> &lt; -0x100) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="150"><span class="doxyHighlight">      EmitInt8(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/arm/ehabi/#a391979058f7394854c8e99446129c5aaa88017af7551328f81fac3ba62cd12258">ARM::EHABI::UNWIND&#95;OPCODE&#95;DEC&#95;VSP</a> | 0x3fu);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="151"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a> += 0x100;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="152"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="153"><span class="doxyHighlight">    EmitInt8(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/arm/ehabi/#a391979058f7394854c8e99446129c5aaa88017af7551328f81fac3ba62cd12258">ARM::EHABI::UNWIND&#95;OPCODE&#95;DEC&#95;VSP</a> |</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="154"><span class="doxyHighlight">             </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static&#95;cast&lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">uint8&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">&gt;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(((-<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a>) - 4) &gt;&gt; 2));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="155"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="156"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="157"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="158" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/unwindopcodeassembler/#ab94eb68723fc4c7d5378c1fbac1c194b"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/unwindopcodeassembler/#ab94eb68723fc4c7d5378c1fbac1c194b">UnwindOpcodeAssembler::Finalize</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;PersonalityIndex,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="159"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                     <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl">SmallVectorImpl&lt;uint8&#95;t&gt;</a> &amp;Result) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00160" /><CodeLine lineNumber="160"><span class="doxyHighlight">  UnwindOpcodeStreamer OpStreamer(Result);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="161"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="162"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (HasPersonality) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="163"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// User-specifed personality routine: &#91; SIZE , OP1 , OP2 , ... &#93;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00164" /><CodeLine lineNumber="164"><span class="doxyHighlight">    PersonalityIndex = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/arm/ehabi/#a7b99cf0c7d83797700266fe3d55872e7a95314429fa79c010af353b0a2c8f75d6">ARM::EHABI::NUM&#95;PERSONALITY&#95;INDEX</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00165" /><CodeLine lineNumber="165"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">size&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> TotalSize = Ops.size() + 1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00166" /><CodeLine lineNumber="166"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">size&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> RoundUpSize = (TotalSize + 3) / 4 &#42; 4;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="167"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Result.resize(RoundUpSize);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00168" /><CodeLine lineNumber="168"><span class="doxyHighlight">    OpStreamer.EmitSize(RoundUpSize);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="169"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="170"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If no personalityindex is specified, select ane</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="171"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (PersonalityIndex == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/arm/ehabi/#a7b99cf0c7d83797700266fe3d55872e7a95314429fa79c010af353b0a2c8f75d6">ARM::EHABI::NUM&#95;PERSONALITY&#95;INDEX</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="172"><span class="doxyHighlight">      PersonalityIndex = (Ops.size() &lt;= 3) ? <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/arm/ehabi/#a7b99cf0c7d83797700266fe3d55872e7a74f0546618adde7fd3715e03c8af0d09">ARM::EHABI::AEABI&#95;UNWIND&#95;CPP&#95;PR0</a></span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="173"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                           : <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/arm/ehabi/#a7b99cf0c7d83797700266fe3d55872e7a091a1026c8394033f84acddfe2ad596d">ARM::EHABI::AEABI&#95;UNWIND&#95;CPP&#95;PR1</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00174" /><CodeLine lineNumber="174"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (PersonalityIndex == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/arm/ehabi/#a7b99cf0c7d83797700266fe3d55872e7a74f0546618adde7fd3715e03c8af0d09">ARM::EHABI::AEABI&#95;UNWIND&#95;CPP&#95;PR0</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00175" /><CodeLine lineNumber="175"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &#95;&#95;aeabi&#95;unwind&#95;cpp&#95;pr0: &#91; 128 , OP1 , OP2 , OP3 &#93;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00176" /><CodeLine lineNumber="176"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(Ops.size() &lt;= 3 &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;too many opcodes for &#95;&#95;aeabi&#95;unwind&#95;cpp&#95;pr0&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00177" /><CodeLine lineNumber="177"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Result.resize(4);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00178" /><CodeLine lineNumber="178"><span class="doxyHighlight">      OpStreamer.EmitPersonalityIndex(PersonalityIndex);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00179" /><CodeLine lineNumber="179"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00180" /><CodeLine lineNumber="180"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &#95;&#95;aeabi&#95;unwind&#95;cpp&#95;pr&#123;1,2&#125;: &#91; &#123;0x81,0x82&#125; , SIZE , OP1 , OP2 , ... &#93;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00181" /><CodeLine lineNumber="181"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">size&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> TotalSize = Ops.size() + 2;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00182" /><CodeLine lineNumber="182"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">size&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> RoundUpSize = (TotalSize + 3) / 4 &#42; 4;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00183" /><CodeLine lineNumber="183"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Result.resize(RoundUpSize);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00184" /><CodeLine lineNumber="184"><span class="doxyHighlight">      OpStreamer.EmitPersonalityIndex(PersonalityIndex);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00185" /><CodeLine lineNumber="185"><span class="doxyHighlight">      OpStreamer.EmitSize(RoundUpSize);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="186"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00187" /><CodeLine lineNumber="187"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00188" /><CodeLine lineNumber="188"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00189" /><CodeLine lineNumber="189"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Copy the unwind opcodes</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00190" /><CodeLine lineNumber="190"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">size&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> i = OpBegins.size() - 1; i &gt; 0; --i)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00191" /><CodeLine lineNumber="191"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">size&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> j = OpBegins&#91;i - 1&#93;, end = OpBegins&#91;i&#93;; j &lt; end; ++j)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00192" /><CodeLine lineNumber="192"><span class="doxyHighlight">      OpStreamer.EmitByte(Ops&#91;j&#93;);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00193" /><CodeLine lineNumber="193"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00194" /><CodeLine lineNumber="194"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Emit the padding finish opcodes if the size is not multiple of 4</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00195" /><CodeLine lineNumber="195"><span class="doxyHighlight">  OpStreamer.FillFinishOpcode();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00196" /><CodeLine lineNumber="196"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00197" /><CodeLine lineNumber="197"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Reset the assembler state</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00198" /><CodeLine lineNumber="198"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/unwindopcodeassembler/#a9ef9e820b750c101003978da4aaf66ae">Reset</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00199" /><CodeLine lineNumber="199"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>

</ProgramListing>


</DoxygenPage>
